Feats: Alert; Dungeon Delver; Healer; Magic Initiate (Wizard); Savage Attacker Human Features: Human Ability Adjustment; Language (Common; Choose 1 from any) Ranger Features: Armor Proficiency (Light; Medium; Shield); Beast Master; Bestial Fury; Colossus Slayer; Defensive Tactics; Escape The Horde; Evasion; Exceptional Training; Extra Attack; Favored Enemy; Feral Senses; Fighting Style (Archery); Fighting Style (Defense); Fighting Style (Dueling); Fighting Style (Two-Weapon Fighting); Fighting Style; Foe Slayer; Giant Killer; Hide In Plain Sight; Horde Breaker; Hunter's Prey; Hunter; Land's Stride; Multiattack Defense; Multiattack; Natural Explorer; Primeval Awareness; Ranger Archetype; Ranger's Companion; Save Proficiency (Strength; Dexterity); Share Spells; Skill Proficiency (Choose 3 from Animal Handling, Athletics, Insight, Investigation, Nature, Perception, Stealth, Survival); Spellcasting; Stand Against The Tide; Steel Will; Superior Hunter's Defense; Uncanny Dodge; Vanish; Volley; Weapon Proficiency (Simple Weapons; Martial Weapons); Whirlwind Attack Acolyte Features: Language (Choose 2 from any); Shelter Of The Faithful; Skill Proficiency (Insight; Religion)
Feature Notes:
Defensive Tactics: 1 selection
Fighting Style: 1 selection
Hunter's Prey: 1 selection
Multiattack: 1 selection
Ranger Archetype: 1 selection
Superior Hunter's Defense: 1 selection
Bestial Fury: Companion can make 2 attacks per rd
Exceptional Training: Can use a bonus action to command companion to Dash, Disengage, or Help instead of Attack/Companion attacks count as magical
Ranger's Companion: Companion beast of up to CR 1/4 obeys commands and gains +6 Armor Class, attack, damage, and proficient skills and saving throws
Shelter Of The Faithful: Can receive aid from temples of Egyptian-Nephthys and fellow believers
Skill Proficiency: Athletics; Insight; Perception; Religion; Stealth
Skills:
Acrobatics: (dex) 1 Insight: (wis) 9 Performance: (cha) 2
Animal Handling: (wis) 3 Intimidation: (cha) 2 Persuasion: (cha) 2
Arcana: (int) 1 Investigation: (int) 1 Religion: (int) 7
Athletics: (str) 7 Medicine: (wis) 3 Sleight Of Hand: (dex) 1
Deception: (cha) 2 Nature: (int) 1 Stealth: (dex) 7
History: (int) 1 Perception: (wis) 9 Survival: (wis) 3
Languages: Celestial; Common; Infernal; Orc
Skill Notes:
Dungeon Delver: Has advantage on Perception and Investigation (secret door detection)/Suffers no Perception penalty when traveling at a fast pace
Favored Enemy: Has advantage on Survival to track and on Intelligence to recall info about 3 chosen creature types, and can learn any languages they speak
Feral Senses: R30' Can locate invisible creatures
Healer: Using a healer's kit to stabilize also restores 1 hit point/Can use a healer's kit to restore 1d6+4 + target HD hit points once per creature per short rest
Hide In Plain Sight: +10 Stealth to hide using prepared camouflage; moving or taking an action or reaction ends
Natural Explorer: In 3 chosen terrain types, gains +6 on proficient Intelligence and Wisdom skills, moves normally through difficult terrain, never becomes lost, always remains alert, can stealth alone at full speed, locates double food, and gains extra info from tracking
Vanish: Can hide as a bonus action and can be tracked only via magic
Combat
Hit Points: 161 Initiative: 6 Armor Class: 14 Attacks Per Round: 2
Armor Proficiency: Light; Medium; Shield Weapon Proficiency: Martial Weapons; Simple Weapons
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: None Weapons: Greataxe (+7 1d12+1); Mace (+7 1d6+1); Shortsword (+7 1d6+1); Unarmed (+7 1+1)
Combat Notes:
Alert: +5 Initiative
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +80
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Damage Adjustment: +1
Extra Attack: +1 Attacks Per Round
Fighting Style (Archery): +2 ranged attacks
Fighting Style (Defense): +1 Armor Class in armor
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Alert: Cannot be surprised, and unseen foes gain no advantage on attacks on self
Colossus Slayer: Can inflict +1d8 HP damage vs. an already-injured foe once per rd
Escape The Horde: Foes have disadvantage on opportunity attacks targeting self
Feral Senses: Suffers no disadvantage vs. an invisible foe
Fighting Style (Dueling): +2 damage with a single, one-handed melee weapon
Fighting Style (Two-Weapon Fighting): Adds ability modifier to second attack damage
Foe Slayer: Can gain a choice of +3 attack or damage vs. a favored enemy once per rd
Giant Killer: Can use a reaction to attack an adjacent Large or larger foe after it misses self
Horde Breaker: Can make a second attack on a different adjacent foe once per rd
Multiattack Defense: After a successful foe attack, gains +4 Armor Class vs. additional attacks from the same foe in same rd
Savage Attacker: Can take the best of two melee damage rolls once per rd
Stand Against The Tide: Can use a reaction to redirect a foe melee miss to another creature
Uncanny Dodge: Can use a reaction to reduce the damage taken from an attack by half
Volley: Can make a ranged attack on any number of foes in a 10' radius
Whirlwind Attack: Can make a melee attack on any number of adjacent foes
Save Proficiency: Dexterity; Strength
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 4; Dexterity: 7; Intelligence: 1; Strength: 7; Wisdom: 3
Save Notes:
Dungeon Delver: Has advantage to avoid or resist traps and resistance to trap damage
Evasion: Successful Dexterity saves yield no damage instead of half, and failures yield half damage
Land's Stride: Has advantage vs. impeding plants
Steel Will: Has advantage vs. fright
Magic
Spell Slots: R1: 4; R2: 3; R3: 3; R4: 3; R5: 2; W0: 2; W1: 1 Attack: R: 9; W: 7 Spell DC: R: 17; W: 15
Spells:
Animal Friendship (R1 Ench): R30' Convinces target beast that self is harmless (save Wisdom negates; Intelligence 4 or higher immune) for 1 day or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Beast Sense (R2 Divi): Self can perceive through a touched willing beast's senses for concentration up to 1 hr [R]
Color Spray (W1 Illu): 15' cone blinds 6d10 HP of targets for 1 rd [+Level affects +2d10 HP of targets]
Commune With Nature (R5 Divi): Reveals 3 facts about nature within 3 miles, or within 300' when underground [R]
Conjure Barrage (R3 Conj): 60' cone inflicts 3d8 HP weapon type damage (save Dexterity half)
Conjure Woodland Beings (R4 Conj): R60' Summons a choice of 1, 2, 4, or 8 obedient CR 2, 1, half, or quarter fey creatures for concentration up to 1 hr [+Level doubles or triples the number of creatures at level 6 or 8]
Cordon Of Arrows (R2 Tran): R5' Four arrows or crossbow bolts attack non-designated creatures within 30', inflicting 1d6 HP piercing each (save Dexterity negates), for 8 hr [+Level affects +2 pieces]
Cure Wounds (R1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+3 hit points [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Ensnaring Strike (R1 Conj): Next successful self attack restrains the foe and inflicts 1d6 HP per rd piercing (save Strength ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Friends (W0 Ench): Self gains advantage on Charisma checks with a non-hostile target for concentration up to 1 min; the target becomes hostile afterward
Grasping Vine (R4 Conj): R30' 30' vine pulls the target 20' each rd (save Dexterity negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Jump (R1 Tran): Touched gains triple jump distance for 1 min
Minor Illusion (W0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Pass Without Trace (R2 Abju): Targets in a 30' radius gain +10 Stealth and become trackable only by magic for concentration up to 1 hr
Plant Growth (R3 Tran): R150' Causes plants in a 100' radius to overgrow or enriches a 1/2 mile radius for 1 year
Stoneskin (R4 Abju): Touched gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for concentration up to 1 hr
Swift Quiver (R5 Tran): Touched quiver dispenses ammo endlessly and allows two ranged attacks as a bonus action for concentration up to 1 min
Water Breathing (R3 Tran): R30' 10 targets can breathe underwater for 24 hr [R]
Magic Notes:
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Knows 2 wizard cantrips and can cast a chosen W1 spell once per long rest
Primeval Awareness: Can spend a spell slot to sense creatures in a 1 mile radius, or in a 6 mile radius of favored terrain, for 1 min per slot level
Share Spells: R30' Can have spells cast on self also affect companion
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the ranger spell list
